translations: n.钦佩，赞美，欣赏；赞美对象

sentences.sentence: He ducked his head to hide his admiration.
sentences.translation: 他低下头以掩饰他的羡慕。

sentences.sentence: He professed his admiration for their work.
sentences.translation: 他表示钦佩他们的工作。

sentences.sentence: He was extravagant in his admiration of Hellas.
sentences.translation: 他对希腊的崇拜过了头。
